Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a light-brown pottery wine-jar, the fabric is greyish in section, the exterior is covered with a burnished cream-coloured slip and faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393539) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393539)
